pages.title: Fertile Soil
pages.text: Increases crop growth speed and doesn't need to be watered!

pages.title: Greenhouse Glass
pages.text: Increases growth speed of crops placed below. Requires direct line of sight to the sky.

pages.title: Lilypad Of Fertility
pages.text: Increases crop growth speed in a ?x? area around it. Must be placed on water. Stackable.

pages.title: Cyclic Sprinkler
pages.text: Increases crop growth speed in a ?x? area around it. Must be placed on water. Stackable.

pages.title: OpenBlocks Sprinkler
pages.text: Waters and increases crop growth speed in a ?x? area around it.

pages.title: MA Growth Accelerator
pages.text: Accelerates the crops on dirt directly above it. Can be stacked up to 64 below.
